name: Pyromania
description:
Build pyros to burn up enemy buildings and stop their expansion! Made for Ludum Dare 42 by Zach and GroovyUnicyclist.

Instructions:

To play, use the village orders bar at the bottom to instruct your villagers to do things such as collect goo and wood or build a pyro factory. Once you've got a pyro factory built, make some pyros and instruct them to attack the enemy's buildings! You'll need wood to make a pyro factory and goo to make pyros.

As you play, the enemy is constructing new houses on the top of the screen. These are the ones you've got to destroy before there's so many they're reaching your houses. Use WASD or Arrow keys to scroll around the screen and find the enemy buildings.
